【考法 1】 vt. 保守陈述： to state or present with restraint especially for effect
【例】 understate a problem 低调处理问题
【近】 downplay
【反】 vaunt, exaggerate, overstate 夸大
【派】 understated adj. 朴素的： avoiding obvious emphasis or embellishment
【近】 conservative, low-key, muted, repressed, restrained, sober, subdued, unflashy, unpretentious
【反】 flamboyant, flaring, flashy, garish, gaudy, glitzy, ostentatious, splashy 夸张的，华丽的
